სათავსო, საგარდერობო, ავეჯი, ჩაშენებული ავეჯი, ტექნიკა, ინტერნეტი, საკაბელო TV, ლიფტი, გათბობა: ცენტრალური, გაზი, დენი, ცხ წყალი: გაზი 
 PENTHOUSE FOR RENT - 
101 sq/meters, 18 & 19 floors, 6 rooms with brand new furnitures (2 bedrooms, 1 living room and 1 kitchen open American plan, 2 x bathrooms, 1 x storeroom, 1 Veranda and 1 terrace with amazing views from 18th & 19 floors
Large, immaculate and stylish Penthouse in newly constructed building located at a quiet area with great location. It is great place with stunning views from both floors
For a tour contact Keti / Cell: 599 437 657 (speaking Russian, Georgian and a fair English).
